location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 54: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: William Digges Latouche states that he has sent this dispatch in the hope of it overtaking Paul Benfield and the other gentlemen travelling with him (see the previous item in this volume) before their departure from Bushire. He asks Edward Galley to forward with the aforementioned gentlemen an accompanying packet for Bombay.
